00020 #include <float.h>
00021 #include <sys/types.h>
00022 
00023 #include "laserdatatracker.h"
00024 
00025 namespace RDK2 { namespace SensorData {
00026 
00027 void LaserDataTracker::reset()
00028 {
00029     extLaserData.points.clear();
00030 }
00031 
00032 void LaserDataTracker::update(const LaserData& laserData, const Point2od& sensorPose)
00033 {
00034     if (extLaserData.points.size() == 0) {
00035         double rayWidth = laserData.getRayWidth();
00036         int trackedRaysCount = (int) (M_PI * 2 / rayWidth + 1);
00037         extLaserData.minTheta = -((double)trackedRaysCount/2)*rayWidth;
00038         extLaserData.maxTheta = -extLaserData.minTheta;
00039         extLaserData.points.resize(trackedRaysCount);   // default constructor of LaserPoint sets reading to 0
00040         extLaserData.updateThetas();
00041         for (size_t i = 0; i < laserData.points.size(); i++) {
00042             int index = extLaserData.getNearestIndex(laserData.points[i].theta);
00043             extLaserData.points[index].reading = (laserData.points[i].isValid() ? laserData.points[i].reading : DBL_MAX);
00044         }
00045     }
00046     else {
00047         double ax = sensorPose.x - lastSensorPose.x;
00048         double ay = sensorPose.y - lastSensorPose.y;
00049         double alpha = sensorPose.theta - lastSensorPose.theta;
00050         double tx = ax * cos(-lastSensorPose.theta) - ay * sin(-lastSensorPose.theta);
00051         double ty = ax * sin(-lastSensorPose.theta) + ay * cos(-lastSensorPose.theta);
00052         
00053         vector<LaserData::LaserPoint> trackedRays;
00054         trackedRays.resize(extLaserData.points.size());
00055         for (size_t i = 0; i < extLaserData.points.size(); i++) trackedRays[i] = extLaserData.points[i];
00056         
00057         for (size_t i = 0; i < trackedRays.size(); i++) {
00058             // cartesian coordinates of the point in old reference system
00059             Point2d p(trackedRays[i].reading * cos(trackedRays[i].theta),
00060                 trackedRays[i].reading * sin(trackedRays[i].theta));
00061                 
00062             // intermediate reference system
00063             p.x -= tx;
00064             p.y -= ty;
00065             
00066             // cartesian coordinates of the point in the new reference system
00067             p = p.rot(-alpha);
00068             
00069             // polar coordinates in the new reference system (null rays are not updated)
00070             if (trackedRays[i].isValid()) {
00071                 trackedRays[i].reading = Point2d(0., 0.).distTo(p);
00072                 trackedRays[i].theta = Point2d(0., 0.).thetaWith(p);
00073             }
00074             if (trackedRays[i].reading < 0.01) trackedRays[i].markInvalid();
00075         }
00076         
00077         for (size_t i = 0; i < extLaserData.points.size(); i++) extLaserData.points[i].reading = DBL_MAX;
00078         
00079         // track old rays
00080         for (size_t i = 0; i < trackedRays.size(); i++) {
00081             bool updateIt = false;
00082             int idx = extLaserData.getNearestIndex(trackedRays[i].theta);
00083             if (trackedRays[i].isValid()) {
00084                 if (!extLaserData.points[idx].isValid() || extLaserData.points[idx].reading < 0.01) updateIt = true;
00085                 else if (trackedRays[i].reading < extLaserData.points[idx].reading) updateIt = true;
00086             }
00087             if (updateIt) extLaserData.points[idx].reading = trackedRays[i].reading;
00088         }
00089         
00090         // update with new rays
00091         for (size_t i = 0; i < laserData.points.size(); i++) {
00092             if (laserData.points[i].reading < 0.01) continue;
00093             if (laserData.points[i].isValid()) {
00094                 int idx = extLaserData.getNearestIndex(laserData.points[i].theta);
00095                 if (laserData.points[i].isValid()) extLaserData.points[idx].reading = laserData.points[i].reading;
00096             }
00097         }
00098         
00099         // interpolate invalid rays
00100         bool wasInvalid = true;
00101         int lastValidIdx = -1;
00102         for (size_t i = 0; i < extLaserData.points.size(); i++) {
00103             if (extLaserData.points[i].isValid()) {
00104                 if (wasInvalid && lastValidIdx != -1) {
00105                     if (i - lastValidIdx < 5) {     // FIXME why 5?
00106                         for (size_t j = lastValidIdx + 1; j < i; j++) {
00107                             // FIXME a linear interpolation should be better than radial interpolation
00108                             double a = (double) (j - lastValidIdx) / (i - lastValidIdx);
00109                             extLaserData.points[j].reading = (1-a) * extLaserData.points[lastValidIdx].reading
00110                                 + a * extLaserData.points[i].reading;
00111                         }
00112                     }
00113                 }
00114                 wasInvalid = false;
00115                 lastValidIdx = i;
00116             }
00117             else {
00118                 wasInvalid = true;
00119             }
00120         }
00121     }
00122     
00123     lastSensorPose = sensorPose;
00124 }
00125
